name: Mount St. Helens
overview: Mount St. Helens is a choose your own adventure type game. The catch is that there's only one right choice for every action. The game places you on the slopes of Mount St. Helens during a volcanic eruption. The goal is to get to safety. At every turn the game describes the scenario and offers some options. The player simply types the number of the option he or she wants to perform. Picking the wrong one will result in an untimely death.
